March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Llandudno, Conwy, Wales, UK March contest - 1st Nantlle Vale, 2nd Penrhynside. Hymn tune contest - 1st Nantlle Vale, 2nd Penrhynside. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 2, 2018, 11:34 a.m. Nov. 2, 2018, 11:44 a.m.
1 Rhyl Silver Band Wilfred W. Halsey The Carnival of Flowers
2 Dyffryn Nantlle Band B. H. Jones Hiawatha [Coleridge-Taylor arr. Godfrey]
3 Colwyn Bay A. H. Woodford Gems of Italian Opera
3 Penrhyn Side David Williams Gems of Cambria
5 Llanrwst Town E. Davies Dawn of Spring
